attributes.action: Prioritise Homes for citizens born in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned, petition the government to prioritise homes available today for citizens born in this country.
I believe that immigration is fine, but people who were born in the UK should be given priority to housing currently available in the country, as at the moment there are a very large number of homeless people who were born in the UK and they could have a house to live in.
This would hopefully decrease homelessness and provide people who are born in the UK a chance to live somewhere rather than being homeless.
